column4: can somebody tell help me with some display issues? I hooked my karmic box up to my HDTV and I get a "not compatible with this signal" error
your lacking in some details like the HDTV type and video card
For your HDTV, I'm gonna guess that you need specific timings since most dont conform to standard monitor configurations
Your not comparing apples to apples ( no pun intended).  MAC's usually have their hardware set up different then a standard PC.  I tried with my deskto and had similiar problems with my Vizio
